title: Taming the Beast
description: Sarah Clark's life is irrevocably changed at the age of fourteen when her English teacher, Mr. Carr, seduces her after class. Their affair is illegal, erotic, and dangerous - a passionate meeting of minds and bodies. But when Mr. Carr's wife discovers the affair he has to choose between them and moves to another city with his family.Sarah is devastated and from that day on embarks on a series of sexual encounters in the hope that with each man she will experience the same passion as with Mr. Carr. Seven years later Daniel Carr walks back into Sarah's life and she is drawn once again into the violently destructive relationship. Is Sarah strong enough to 'tame the beast'?
author: Emily Maguire
